Detailed Description

template<class DivisionSpace>
class Point< DivisionSpace >

A point can be represented by an instance of this class.

template<class DivisionSpace >
FT Point< DivisionSpace >::operator& ( Point< DivisionSpace > &  p)
inline

Euclidean distance squared.

Faster to compute than Euclidean distance and enough for comparison. This version unrolls the loop.

Parameters
p- the other point
Returns
- the squared Euclidean distance of p and this point
